Reviews.Title: Works For Its Purposes
Reviews.Author: Bob
Reviews.Content: I ordered three of these for a large garage area and the covered walkway approaches.They arrived in two days (Nevada to Washington State), were easy to install, and work fine.A few notes: they take 2 AA batteries (not included).  The units mount with two screws on the bottom (screws also not included, but easily available at a hardware store).  The battery compartment is on the bottom, so do not tighten the screws down too far into the wood, or you'll have a tough time when it comes to battery changing, as it's a twist to remove sort of thing to disengage the unit from the wall/ceiling. An alternative to screw mounting is two sided velcro (given that the units only weigh 5.45 ounces/155 grams with the batteries inside).There is an odd 1/2 inch open hole in the bottom of the unit that seems to have no useful purpose other than to let in moisture and bugs.  Plug this up with tape before mounting.Placing this unit in an area that is exposed to direct moisture (like rain), seems problematic as there are quite a few places for the water to enter along the bottom plastic globe dome edging, and under the base.The flashing red LED light is bright, and at a distance of more than say 8 feet in a darkened area, the units look similar to my much more expensive real cameras installed last year.These get a five star rating for usefulness for the purpose, and overall value.They also get a five star rating for the humorous use of English on the outside of the Chinese-made box: "welcome to use our camera!" "Inside and outside the villa installs the photograph function to play the better guard role!" "Emulational camera can be wsed both in front and behind cars!" (not sure I'd want to do that last one...grin).

Reviews.Title: Don't put in battery
Reviews.Author: Daryl Gates
Reviews.Content: For a couple of bucks this is a good deal (probably costs 13 cents to make), don't put a battery in it, security camera don't have red "blinking lights", this is a dead give-away to a thief.

Reviews.Title: The flashing LED makes it look fake, but it's worthwhile anyway.
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey Pittman "Jeff"
Reviews.Content: This is pretty believable if you don't put batteries in it to make the LED flash.  I bought two and started them out that way (battery compartment quality was so poor that I had to stuff in some paper to force the batteries to stay in place).  The red LEDs flashed constantly, and then I realized: you NEVER see cameras like this with flashing LEDs in the real world.  Black domed cameras are all over the campus I work in, they pepper the ceilings of pretty much every store I shop in, and *none* of them have flashing red LEDs.  So I took out the batteries and suddenly these looked a lot more authentic.  Oh, and unless I'm confusing this product with another, there is no motion-detected activation of the LED - if there are live batteries in this guy, the LED flashes.  I picked up some Velcro strips from Wally World, mounted them in a couple of places and, well, they look like surveillance cameras to me.  At this price, that's good enough.  I'm just trying to scare bad people away so I don't have to break out the Mossberg.Update 12/1/2011: secure it well.  I got supposedly industrial strength Velcro brand adhesive strips but they were recessed too far into the "camera" housing to get a really good stick going.  On the first cold morning, 1 of 2 (back porch) fell off when the Velcro adhesive faily and it smashed into oblivion.  On the second cold morning, 2 of 2 (front porch) did the same.  I just ordered two more and will doctor them up with Gorilla tape before attaching the Velcro.  No complaints about the product or the Velcro, I just need to do a little more thoughtful prep.

Reviews.Title: Having troubles with your neighbors?  This may be the best solution ever!  Please read my story:
Reviews.Author: A. Adams
Reviews.Content: I bought this fake camera (several actually) for different reasons than most and I wanted to share my story: We treated our next door neighbors like kings & queens for years since they seemed to be somewhat down on their luck. We gave them money, clothes, food from our cupboards, games & toys for their children and even rides to and back from football practice for one of their kids.  We became so close that at one point our neighbors were calling my Fiancé' "Aunt" if that tells you anything.  Well after several years of giving and giving we started to notice that we got nothing in return.  Not that we were expecting anything but after  3 years you start to feel used.This neighbor next door (known as Heather E.) took advantage of us as well as several other neighbors and simply used us and took all she could get.  There are too many details to share but you should know that Heather has a new best friend every 4 months is often fighting with someone for various reason (mostly in her head).Shortly after we weaned ourselves of this one-sided relationship we saw that Heather E. and family began just opening their back door (that faced our house) and instead of putting their trash in the garbage can, they simply tossed it outside and let it land where it may.  After a year+ of dealing with this "trash house" we were forced to contact the City of Gresham Code Enforcement here in Oregon.  Code Enforcement quickly hopped on it and delivered an ultimatum to Heather E. and family: Clean things up or be fined. That night we saw Heather E. her best friend of the moment and one of her sons quickly cleanining up the refuse at 8:30pm at night!What we didn't know was that for the past year Heather E. and family were throwing bags of trash into their shed outdoors and it had accumulated so much that it was overflowing inside!  2 days after Heather E. was forced to clean things up, I went outside and noticed that there was a large, dead possum laying on the path to my shed.  This possum had clearly been dead for months and the only way that it made its way to my path was that is was placed there by someone.  My Fiancé and I quickly surmised that this possum had gotten into Heather E.'s shed and became trapped inside where it died. As retribution for contacting Code Enforcement, our wonderful neighbors placed the possum on our property.  I quickly picked up the possum and threw it back into Heather E.'s shed (with a glove mind you) and never heard about it again.This is where the fake camera comes in: Rather than buy a gun or 2 along with a 6- foot fence with barbed wire or take some kind of militant stand here, I decided on a different approach.  I had no idea what Heather E. and family might do next to escalate things so a fake camera was the PERFECT solution.  Once installed, Heather E. instantly went on Facebook complaining about my cameras and even remarked that they were "illegal" and "he doesn't have permission to film my house!"  Clearly Heather E. doesn't know the law.  :)In a nutshell these cameras worked like a miracle.  They fooled our neighbors into thinking that they were being filmed at all times and basically it kept them from damaging our property (or worse).  An unexpected bonus is that Heather E. and family never come out on that side of the house.  Since they think they are on camera 24 hours a day, they choose to smoke on the other side of their house and rarely make an appearance.  Even better, Heather E. is so paranoid that she put up cheap towels over the windows and doors so my cameras couldn't see in.  LOL!  Wonderful.These cameras look real (at least to the low-life people next door) and it keeps them honest and away from our house.  Sure, no one likes fighting with neighbors and we really have 0 contact with them which is great, but these cameras add an extra layer of protection.  If Heather E. wants to mess with our house or vandalize things, she thinks she'll be on camera.  This couldn't have worked better for a non-violent, passive solution to our neighbors from hell.We have our neighbors trained and life is good again.

Reviews.Title: It's ok i guess
Reviews.Author: Dave
Reviews.Content: For what i paid for it,it is worth it.Looks semi real close up.From a distance it looks better.Like i said the price is right so if it keeps the scum away then i am happy.

Reviews.Title: Very cheap construction, but do what they need to
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: First, I like this product, but want to say to the seller, please delete the fake reviews you or your people posted. the bad english is easy to spot. I agree with most of the legit reviews. You are paying $3 for something so its not going to be perfect. However, the appearance, even at close distance, is perfect. You can see the camera inside. I chose to use these indoors, but in view of a window or glass door, as the led looks like a motion sensor beam; the camera inside looks real enough. The beam flashes and stays on all the time. Since the average burglar is a drug addled teenager, I'd say these items in my kitchen window and back room would easily intimidate an opportunistic burglar. I have security stickers, and two or three working bullet cameras up as well, so these fake ones kind of cover some blind spots I was concerned about. They make it look like, when placed by a window or door, that crossing the led beam will trigger a motion sensor. No problem having them on all the time, since during the day the light is not very bright, but still visible. I took off one star because of the fake reviews here, and one more because they came with no screws. I found the Chinglish on the box they came in to be highly amusing...."welcome for to use our camera!" LOL.

Reviews.Title: Box was a better highlight than the camera
Reviews.Author: J. Apfel "Maxito's dad"
Reviews.Content: Camera almost looks real, but likely wouldn't fool most people in the know.  The box however provided endless humor with much "Engrish" as these cameras protect villa and car!

Reviews.Title: so real
Reviews.Author: steve
Reviews.Content: It looked so real that the person I was playing a joke on with it quit his job. I was just trying to scare him into doing some work what a bonus.

Reviews.Title: It's only $5????
Reviews.Author: Old EnglishMajor
Reviews.Content: Wow, it looks real and I'd think it should cost a lot more.  Can't go wrong here.  Will make the bads guys think twice.

Reviews.Title: Fail
Reviews.Author: James G Lisk
Reviews.Content: So cheap it came apart during installation.  A total waste of money.  Cheap, but it's not really cheap if it doesn't work.

Reviews.Title: ITS ALRIGHT
Reviews.Author: larry
Reviews.Content: Its nice but Iwish the red light did not blink all the time. I thought it was activated by motion.

Reviews.Title: Terrible
Reviews.Author: Deborah Marlott
Reviews.Content: Broke apart as soon as I installed! Cheap piece of junk! Would not tell anyone to purchase this junk!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! CHEAP JUNK!

Reviews.Title: Looks Real !
Reviews.Author: La Piniac
Reviews.Content: Has a blinking red LED when you put in batteries.  I haven't decided if that makes it look more real or more fake yet.  I'm tempted to take the batteries out because of it.  If you look carefully, it's got a gizmo inside that looks like a camera.Overall, you can't beat what this unit provides for the price.  I've one on each of my doors and am very satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Great for the money
Reviews.Author: Mitchell F. Rohrbach
Reviews.Content: This fake camera may be enough to deter the undesirables that roam about.  It looks real enough.  Great for the money for sure.

Reviews.Title: looks real
Reviews.Author: Design Diva "Design Diva"
Reviews.Content: Although I have cameras throughout the outside of the house as well as a few on the inside.  I added this to a room we seldom use.  Since most of our staff knows there are cameras, we had never had anything missing. After a recent trip, we did have a little incident where something went missing.  Since adding this one weekend when no one was around, they assume it is real and all is well once again.

Reviews.Title: Looks Real To Me
Reviews.Author: ChurchillM
Reviews.Content: They look look real to me and come with stickers to put in your windows indicating you have closed circuit recording on the property. We got a sign for an alarm company and put it up at the same time. It makes it seem like they might be monitored by a real company.

Reviews.Title: keeps the baddies away
Reviews.Author: RC
Reviews.Content: Used at front and back doors. Keeps baddies at bay. If they come past this they are coming no matter what. Sold my home with these installed and new owner said it was a reason for buying home. (Dummy installation was disclosed only to the eventual buyer)

Reviews.Title: very convincing
Reviews.Author: steven lupinski
Reviews.Content: I bought these as a deterrent ( duh obviously) and they're quite realistic. They are a bit cheaply made but hey for the price you can't complain, no one is any the wiser as to my property being surveilled.

Reviews.Title: looks real enough from a diatance
Reviews.Author: Eric
Reviews.Content: Enough to prevent aquaneances from coming back later and stealing which I feel is 50% of the thefts here.Haven't used the dummy light

Reviews.Title: Got two of these.....
Reviews.Author: BMW1951 "Amazon Queen"
Reviews.Content: I purchased two of these.  One for above my front door and the other for the back patio.  It looks like the real thing.  I would recommend this.  I has a blinking light, but I've read that the real ones do not blink, so when the battery dies, I will not replace it.

Reviews.Title: good unit but the led stays on
Reviews.Author: Victoria Portillo
Reviews.Content: I bought these to augment an existing working system.They look good and were a nice addition. The only drawback was the constant led light that stays on.most cameras that are real don"t have this feature and it takes away from the look> I just removed the light wires.For the cost, these are a decent value.

Reviews.Title: Dummy camera
Reviews.Author: laundry woman
Reviews.Content: Does the job.  Looks real.  Works great.  No problem with hooking it up and operating it.  Great product to use.

Reviews.Title: For the price, it's worth it
Reviews.Author: Sashimoto
Reviews.Content: As this is a nonfunctional item (thus, it's effectiveness hinges upon a ruse, or a fake out as a potential behavior deterrent) it's a bit hard to give a typical rating. However, it does what it is supposed to: appears to be a video security camera, and the flashing red LED light is operational. It seems to be encouraging people to be on their best behavior and refraining from illegal activity (which is why we bought it) ... but I have to say SEEMS to: because it isn't really a video security camera, so I have to make an educated guess (not the camera's fault - obviously I couldn't afford the real thing, so this is the next best option).My one concern about this particular style of imitation security camera is that I've only really seen it as an imitation (i.e., on other internet sites, such as overstock.com crammed in with other "specials") and I am concerned many people can identify it as a fake on sight (in hindsight, perhaps I should have gone with a more tradtional model?). I need to check to see if there are any REAL security cameras that look like this type - and you should too before you decide not to buy it.It did come with a sticker warning of security video in progress, but we decided that was kind of cheesy to use with it (as it just screams: BLUFF!) so we didn't use it.For a fraction of the cost of a real video camera, this makes people second guess doing something lousy or illegal that they wouldn't want themselves recorded doing. I only wish I could be certain that this particular model has a real working counterpart out there, so as to not give the game away to those educated in such matters (my own fault: sorry) to be able to give a better review. But it looks real to me, the red LED light flashes as it should, it is easy to install & remove for battery changes - which I have not had to do yet (Bonus: it doesn't eat batteries!), and it does have a video sticker included if you wish to use it. It also arrived on time, and seemed brand new out of the box. The downside (other than already mentioned) is that it is all plastic, so with very close inspection it does look kind of cheap - but I don't think that most people will linger long enough to get a really good look at it to avoid being videotaped showing interest in it.All and all - it's worth it for the price (especially if you can't afford the real thing).

Reviews.Title: Looks Real!
Reviews.Author: Sharon Leigh Anderson
Reviews.Content: This is a great way to trick thieves at my uncles business. It looks real and a must for anyone in addition to the real camera.

Reviews.Title: perfect for the price.
Reviews.Author: Alexander Taylor
Reviews.Content: Perfect for the price. Everything works fine. Definitely get what you pay for, but at this price point you can't be mad about the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Looks like the real thing
Reviews.Author: Robert Stephan
Reviews.Content: Put it up in the elevator to stop the key scratching and graffiti. Did the trick and it is high enough can't be tampered with.  Just let the battery die, because real cameras don't blink.

Reviews.Title: nice product
Reviews.Author: Litmus Opinionator "Lisa"
Reviews.Content: Ever since we put this up, we have had less solicitors and the strangers that do stand at the porch long enough to notice it, leave quicker than they used to. Guessing they don't like being on "fake" tv, if they see it. Does exactly what we want it to.

Reviews.Title: perfect decoy
Reviews.Author: Gilbert
Reviews.Content: great product to use with really small cameras. It may look fake but once you disassemble it and put a real wireless camera in it, it saves you a lot of money.

Reviews.Title: Looks real
Reviews.Author: Dam944
Reviews.Content: It looks real and the video warning stickers that came with it is a nice touch! I did not install a battery my work place has cameras and do not have the red flashing light!

Reviews.Title: did not use the led
Reviews.Author: William E. Horn
Reviews.Content: looks real, did not put in the battery as the real domes do not have a LED  looks real and seems to work.

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: ronald
Reviews.Content: this is a great product you can adjust the red blinking light up or down so people thinks its real.i did not put the battery in as real cameras do not have light that blinks.

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: Scuba
Reviews.Content: I have it displayed in my office and it Works like a charm. I have a fridge in my office and the camera has detered individuals from taking the drinks its an excellent product!

Reviews.Title: absolutely perfect as long as you don't put in the battery
Reviews.Author: Sam J
Reviews.Content: this thing looks totally believable.. no one would question it.  that's without the battery though.  the second you put in the batteries it makes this thing look absurd.  it is a super bright constantly flashing red LED that might as well have a recording playing along with it that just says "Fake camera alert! Fake camera alert!"ours also came with a "premises under 24 hour video surveillance" sticker, which is definitely a nice touch.for $4 it's a great buy.  just don't put in the batteries unless you're looking to make this thing into a joke.

Reviews.Title: Surprisingly Realistic Looking Cameras even have "Aiming" feature
Reviews.Author: Carguy100
Reviews.Content: Actually I was pleasantly surprised at how realistic these dome cameras look.These dummy cameras look as real as ones that were much more expensive at a localbig box electronics store.  They even include a pretty "real" looking securitysticker for your installation.  The wording on the box is even entertainingdue to the translation and that was just an added benefit.  Very good value.

Reviews.Title: So realistic!
Reviews.Author: Alvaro
Reviews.Content: It's look very realistic. I have other real camera look just like this. It uses two AA batteries and the LED red light blinks every second. High quality/great design.

Reviews.Title: cheaply made but works
Reviews.Author: StoryTeller "Teller"
Reviews.Content: Very cheaply made but looks authentic enough from a distance. It has no on off switch. If batteries are in place, it flashes. If not, it doesn't.  No photo cell to turn it off when it's not dark which in an inside placement would make sense. The dome is "blacked out" except for one small clear area. The light is aimed at that clear spot. So the light can not be seen unless the thing is "pointed" at you. I had thought it would be possible to see the flashing red light from any side (360 degrees), but not so. Light is not weak. Quite bright actually. For the price it is acceptable. It does what I needed, which was make bad guys think that maybe they should find an easier target.Update:Dec.30 2012  Battery contacts have corroded. Not usable anymore. Apparently even more cheaply made than I thought. Not worth the money.

Reviews.Title: litttle cheep looking
Reviews.Author: David Newman "Fire dog"
Reviews.Content: wished the light would have been brighter on the inside. Using it any way hope it will make people SKEERED

Reviews.Title: Not so much for security
Reviews.Author: Rolando Aguilar
Reviews.Content: Led is too bright to pass for a real camera. Shape does look like the real thing but the led kills the ilusion.

Reviews.Title: Great Product!
Reviews.Author: DanmantheShah
Reviews.Content: Product arrived and it does its job. There are no screws included, but you can pick the type needed up at any shop like Home Depot. The red LED light is quite bright and at first does look a little fake, but after letting the batteries break in for awhile and it'll get dimmer. The camera looks very realistic; nobody has suspected its fake yet. Overall well worth the price.Side note... This gets another point just because of the amusing Chinese-to-English translation on the box ("Welcome to use our camera").

Reviews.Title: Garbage
Reviews.Author: Robby Robinson "Globetrotter"
Reviews.Content: It looks real from a distance, but is very cheaply made and all plastic.  The battery compartment broke and it now lives in a land fill somewhere.

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: Bedafiglia
Reviews.Content: I really shouldn't complain because of the cheap cost of this thing, but felt compelled to add a few comments.  First of all, the battery cover doesn't fit right, so the only way it's going to stay on is if I tape or glue it shut.  It looks very cheap and had chunky bits of gray crud stuck to the dome.  And what's with the funky language on the box?  Obviously, someone used Google Translate and never bothered to double check it. Would not recommend this unless you're going to put it far away from anyone's reach, because the closer you get to it, the quicker you realize it's fake.

Reviews.Title: Great Seller
Reviews.Author: P
Reviews.Content: Great product, it worked wonderfully as a deterrent because I was help gun point in my neighborhood which is very nice, in the suburbs, 4 bedroom homes, and since I installed them and got the word out that I have camera's set up around my house I don't see half the activity of cars passing my house at night like I was seeing a few days before and after the event took place. I however did not put the battery in because I did not want the red light blinking. Since then nobody that doesn't belong in my neighborhood drives through since it has only one same entrance and exit.

Reviews.Title: Not Happy
Reviews.Author: David Wells
Reviews.Content: The wires fell off the little connector when unscrewed to install. It was a piece of junk. The appearance of the product looks good, but that is about it.

Reviews.Title: Extremely Cheap
Reviews.Author: Alan S. Nerenberg
Reviews.Content: All I can say is it should have been in a .99 cent store because that's what its worth!!!Bad

Reviews.Title: battery dies too quickly
Reviews.Author: Joshua
Reviews.Content: Like, 2 weeks and it's out. If that doesn't bother you, the overall look is very impressive, looks like the real thing. Careful where you mount them. Mount where there's drywall/sheetrock where there theoretically could be wires into a wall. I saw someone mount these on a stone wall once, was very obvious then it was fake. keep the placement in mind too!

Reviews.Title: ARRIVED BROKEN
Reviews.Author: Sheba Tutu
Reviews.Content: I am very disappointed with this purchase because when it arrived the wires on the inside won't intact fortunately I got someone to fix it and when I eventually got it back it seemed as though I should have left it broken... IT BLINKS TOO MUCH! I won't recommend this product to anyone...

Reviews.Title: Fake security dummy
Reviews.Author: Susan
Reviews.Content: This is very simple and cheap and can be a good security measure.  Don't have to have electricity handy.  I don't know how long the batteries will last but I put it in an area where they can be changed easily.

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: Deno
Reviews.Content: I put it up last fall before we left for the winter home. Will check it when I get home to see if the battery is still good. Looks fine.

Reviews.Title: fake camera
Reviews.Author: CM Erickson
Reviews.Content: i gave mine away. the constant blinking red light is lame (annoying) and screams fake fake fake. Now... had the red light been triggered by a motion sensor I'd still have them & this would be a 5 star review.

Reviews.Title: get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: Jstreeter
Reviews.Content: You get what you pay for.. the cost is cheap and the device looks the same. Unless its 20 feet up in the air you can easily see its fake

Reviews.Title: It looks too fake and breaks too easy.
Reviews.Author: Christopher Farrell
Reviews.Content: it looks so fake that people just laugh at it and one fell and basically shattered. Do not waste your money.

Reviews.Title: hat finder
Reviews.Author: Hat finder
Reviews.Content: Arrived quickly.  No battery included. Blinking light VERY inconspicuous.  Pretty cheap plastic.  We mounted in area protected from weather.  Don't think I would trust the battery compartment to keep out rain!  Not very pricey and not naive enough to believe it will scare away serious burglers!

Reviews.Title: Looks Pretty Real
Reviews.Author: Cameron Kirby
Reviews.Content: We ordered this for our office, and from a distance(1-2 feet) they look pretty real. A lot cheaper than buying a real security system. Great for protecting low value items.

Reviews.Title: Good idea, but only short term
Reviews.Author: kouaka
Reviews.Content: It is a good value for the price, but batteries only last a couple days. I purchased several ones, but without the flashing light, not that impressive. Changing the battery is a hassle, since it needs to be opened

Reviews.Title: PERFECT
Reviews.Author: Michael Hendrickson
Reviews.Content: This is the perfect inexpensive security system. The smart would be criminals won't go near a camera! We just have to worry about the desperate not so smart criminals! Conceal and Carry!

Reviews.Title: Working great
Reviews.Author: Pinkie,      Idaho. "Sandra   W."
Reviews.Content: Have these over the front door, and one in the center of the backside of the house, doing great.  All of my neighbors were calling to ask if I had a medical emergency...

Reviews.Title: This could work if affixed to a high ceiling
Reviews.Author: Sequoia
Reviews.Content: Viewing this at close range, this camera is not very convincing because the plastic casing is not highly refined.  Also, you can't place the camera on top of a shelf and have that be a convincing way of monitoring an office space, because it's not possible to reposition the lens to face the right direction.  But if you have a way of suspending this from the ceiling, so that the lens is facing a sensible direction by default, and making it impossible to closely scrutinize the device itself, this could be effective as a camera mimic.  That didn't work out for me, but it could for you, depending on your situation.

Reviews.Title: Cheap construction
Reviews.Author: Jim Wynans
Reviews.Content: As others commented, this is very cheaply made and is not sturdy.  The wiring is flimsy and inconvenient to install batteries. As others suggested, dome cameras don't have blinking red lights so I didn't put batteries in but I couldn't have done so anyway because the wires break when trying to mount the dome.  Also, there should be a template to position the screws for mounting.  Very inconvenient to mount without using 3 hands!

Reviews.Title: Looks fake
Reviews.Author: sandra amaya
Reviews.Content: It is hard to mount on the wall. looks very fake. I did not like it so much. I waste my money on this one.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: I mounted them high up whee the detail cannot be seen - they certainly look the part and the flashing LED can be clearly seen at night from over 100 ft away - I have 6 on the outside of my house

Reviews.Title: IT DOES THE JOB
Reviews.Author: RUDE BOY
Reviews.Content: VERY CHEAP MATERIAL ..YOU GET WHAT YOU PAY FOR..IM HAPPY DUE TO THE PRICE OF IT MIGHT CONSIDER ORDERING TWO MORE

Reviews.Title: Easy Installation
Reviews.Author: Stan57 "Stan57"
Reviews.Content: I got four of these, one for each corner of the house.  Installation was pretty easy.  I added a little 5 minute epoxy for a more firm mount.  If someone were to reach up and easily and twist it off, the "jig would be up" as they say.  After reading many of the reviews, I decided to leave the battery out and forgo the blinking light.

Reviews.Title: looks realistic
Reviews.Author: Michael Needham
Reviews.Content: this product fits the bill for realistic look and was easy to install, it is not weather proof so it needs to be installed under cover or indoors.

Reviews.Title: Watch for very tender wires.
Reviews.Author: Jeri Witmer
Reviews.Content: Item is difficult to mount in that the wires are fine nd break easily.  Item has to be opened to mount the base while the top hangs by the wires.  It could be made with a plug.

Reviews.Title: Junk!
Reviews.Author: Daniel Coday
Reviews.Content: Hair thin wiring broke just opening the item to put the batteries in.  Tilt adjusters keep falling out causing it to drop.

Reviews.Title: Like it.
Reviews.Author: SAMUEL JIMENEZ
Reviews.Content: This thing looks really real and all are being fooled. They are very authentic looking fake oval camera.Thank you !

Reviews.Title: Cheap Wiring!
Reviews.Author: Michael Gerstenberger
Reviews.Content: Anything like these are for sure better than nothing.  But if you're going to utilize the blinking red light, you better hope your wires stay attached.  On 2 out of 4 of my units, the extremely fine wire has disconnected from the weld spots, causing the light to not operate, so I use those without the blinking light.  The wiring is way too cheap!

Reviews.Title: cheap construction
Reviews.Author: teacher
Reviews.Content: Cheap construction. Had to gut entire center of unit and glue camera in position, otherwise it fell down and could not be seen from the window.

Reviews.Title: Light flashed for about 2 minutes after I installed it.
Reviews.Author: Skizix272
Reviews.Content: Light flashed for about 2 minutes after I installed it.  Looks very real even without a light.  I may just keep it and reinstall without a working light.  Its not like I'm going to reinstall batteries in it every month anyway.  Great deterrent until I cough up the money from real ones.

Reviews.Title: Looks real
Reviews.Author: DocChuck
Reviews.Content: Performs its function, i.e. makes people approaching my front porch to take notice. Has been installed for about three weeks now, and the LED is still flashing.

Reviews.Title: Very poor quality.
Reviews.Author: Boyang Liu
Reviews.Content: The red LED flashes very fast, which is not like real security cam. The build quality is really poor .

Reviews.Title: Installation screws not supplied.
Reviews.Author: dane714
Reviews.Content: This item is inexpensive and understandably cheap looking. From a distance, it might fool someone but that's about it.What bothered me is that two tiny screws are required to install this, and they were not included.  Two screws.  It's the little things that count.

Reviews.Title: Dummy fake security camera
Reviews.Author: Randall Witters
Reviews.Content: Looks like the real thing. May or may not put batteries in the unit, but with the house often empty i gives us pease of mind.

Reviews.Title: Broke
Reviews.Author: Udorn
Reviews.Content: Really thin plastic breaks real easy . Battery cover lock broke first time tired to change batteries. Battery used up pretty fast as well.

Reviews.Title: Not what I expected
Reviews.Author: Bonnie Michaels
Reviews.Content: Did not provide screws to install cameras Cheap plastic frame They look fake Not anything I would recommend to anyone

Reviews.Title: Looks way to fake
Reviews.Author: Kevin
Reviews.Content: This thing looks way to fake and I am not even going to use it.  It also is not made very well at all.

Reviews.Title: fack camera
Reviews.Author: B. Hamilton
Reviews.Content: This product is so flimsy I feared it would break before we could get it put up !  Would not get this again.

Reviews.Title: looks authentic
Reviews.Author: nick
Reviews.Content: looks and works amazing as described. would def recommend this product to anyone in the market for one. great price also

Reviews.Title: Looks good.  Awkward to mount.
Reviews.Author: Jason
Reviews.Content: The mounting holes aren't straight up and down in the middle.  They are at an angle, which makes it tough to mount this to have the camera pointing where you want.  Also, the battery doesn't last long for the LED, so I never change it and just leave it dead.  That being said, a number of people have been fooled by it and asked how well my security cameras worked, etc.  So definitely does its job.

Reviews.Title: Looks real without the light
Reviews.Author: Callie
Reviews.Content: After hearing about a neighbor's home being broken into by people who kicked in their back door when they weren't there, I wanted to increase my home "security."  I already have a home alarm system, but it doesn't include any cameras.  I couldn't really afford the upgrade to a video alarm system, so I decided to buy the fake video.  It looks more realistic without the flashing light, so I installed it by above my back door.  It looks very real, so I'm happy.

Reviews.Title: Bad craftsmanship
Reviews.Author: Cristina
Reviews.Content: The holes that were created for the nails to hang onto are poorly made.  There are two holes that are supposed to have a big hole for the nail to go into then a smaller bubble above the hole so that it can securely hang, but one hole has that small bubble on top (the correct way), then the other hole has the bubble on the bottom (upside down!) So the "camera" is only holding on securely to one nail :(

Reviews.Title: Inoperable when received
Reviews.Author: Glaydell W Jackson
Reviews.Content: The item was inoperable as it had a broken wire but my husband soldered it.  Also, it did not have any instructions...perhaps it was used?

Reviews.Title: Cheap Cheap Cheap
Reviews.Author: satx
Reviews.Content: The plastic is super thin and cheaply made. As i opened the battery case it snapped into two pieces. Very much so a poorly made product.

Reviews.Title: Looks real and who would know but me?
Reviews.Author: Robert L. Sims "tweekie"
Reviews.Content: Works perfect. Bought more to go around the house to accompany my "SMILE! You're Being Filmed!" sign. :OThe red light flickers giving the impression it is attached to some inside alarm system. I am thinking of buying more to attach to my chicken coops for spooking predators. These do the same  thing (flicker red) and are MUCH more bang for the buck. Can buy three of these for one of those. Oh My!

Reviews.Title: it could be better
Reviews.Author: Joe
Reviews.Content: It will pass given that it can't be examined closely, but I was very disappointed that the flashing red LED did not work.

Reviews.Title: GREAT ITEM IF YOU GET ALL THE PARTS..
Reviews.Author: NOT A PRO OK
Reviews.Content: ORDERED LOTS OF THESE.. GREAT ITEM.. PUT IN EVERY ROOM..PEOPLE WONT STEAL IF THEY SEE THESE IN YOUR HOME OR OFFICE.. BUT MY LAST ORDER I DID NOT GET THE SCREW TEMPLATE OR THE SCREWS... THAT CAN MAKE THINGS ROUGH. BUT GOOD DEALS ON AMAZON FOR THIS ITEM.. PRICES CHANGE ALL THE TIME..

Reviews.Title: BOUGHT TWO AND ONE ENEDED UP WITH BROKEN WIRE BEFORE SET UP
Reviews.Author: Eileen Cox "Eileen"
Reviews.Content: Well....they're cheap.  I easily pulled one wire off while figuring out how to install on ceiling--it's toast.  They do look great when up and running.  Also bought two of the $10 "scope" model, one step up in quality.  They look very good.

Reviews.Title: Looks real
Reviews.Author: M. McDonald "Retired APE"
Reviews.Content: Went up easy, and looks like the real thing.  The only reason I did not give it a 5 star rating is the plastic plug that goes in the side (don't know what it's for) is kind of clumsy and may fall out at some point.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: anil veera
Reviews.Content: it works good . people think that its real and we attached to our front door the security people thought its real and compliant our owner that take them to remove that we already have the security cameras.

Reviews.Title: You just dont know
Reviews.Author: Tom Slick
Reviews.Content: Looks like a real cam. The best advice I got was to not put in the batteries. I looked at real cams and no lightthe dome is enough. cheep construction be carefull it is easy to break the chineese plastic.

Reviews.Title: Does he job it is intended for.
Reviews.Author: P. Donah
Reviews.Content: Seems to do the job it was intended for. As long as it keeps criminals at bay it is worth the money.

Reviews.Title: It's Ok U get what U pay 4
Reviews.Author: Charles Dick
Reviews.Content: Inexpensive plastic is ok. But eats batteries, they last less that 2 weeks. All in all it's worth what I paid

Reviews.Title: Not suggested
Reviews.Author: David W Seymour
Reviews.Content: As expected, not of high quality, may fool someone from a distance, not recommended for anything but toy quality and entertainment value.

Reviews.Title: Looks Real
Reviews.Author: Michael Barnes
Reviews.Content: Arrived on time. They cameras look real and are as advertised. I am giving one to my son to use.

Reviews.Title: Best gift
Reviews.Author: sam "sam"
Reviews.Content: Brilliant gadget with a realistic look to it for an amazing low price. Easy to instill. Battery life is average.

Reviews.Title: does all it claimed, we would buy again if needed, at present the equipment is in service and does all it claimed
Reviews.Author: luckyDog
Reviews.Content: does all it claimed, we would buy again if needed, at present the equipment is in service and does all it claimed

Reviews.Title: It Works
Reviews.Author: Brunner
Reviews.Content: I had people notice and it looks like the real thing, no need for the battery causes it to look fake and attracks attention.

Reviews.Title: It cannot be more convincing.
Reviews.Author: A. Complished
Reviews.Content: it does the job. It looks very real, it's very convincing and it gives me a piece of mind. I am very happy with the product.

Reviews.Title: El Cheapo!
Reviews.Author: Edward T. Nista
Reviews.Content: This thing is certainly el cheapo!But it serves it's purpose. I just wish it didn't look and feel so el cheapo.

Reviews.Title: excellent product
Reviews.Author: Professor Davenport
Reviews.Content: I bought several different "fake" security items but after close inspection this is the only one I installed.  I'm ordering two more as well.  The blinking LED and fake lens are very believable in my opinion.

Reviews.Title: High quality
Reviews.Author: Thomas B. Smith
Reviews.Content: This is a cheap deterrent.  Has two double A batteries so flashing light should last a long time.  Even without the light it looks like a real camera.  I glued multiple strand wire to it to make it seem even more real and used double sided tape to mount.  I gave one to my neighbor who had something stolen and he was delighted.

Reviews.Title: Flashing Light
Reviews.Author: chelsea
Reviews.Content: The box indicates motion detecting sensor which of course is false because there is no sensor. I had to adjust the lense as it was off center & discovered that there is a micro switch inside which turns the red blinking light on & off all you need to do is press the dome which is spring loaded to activate this.

Reviews.Title: Fake, Cheap, Junk!
Reviews.Author: Gary L Bahr
Reviews.Content: It is cheap - which is it's only quality. It is a cheaply made product. Half or them broke in one way or another trying to install them. Would never buy another one!

Reviews.Title: like real
Reviews.Author: Bambino
Reviews.Content: It is just like real deal! battery last forever. . . . . . . . . . . . .

Reviews.Title: Flashing light & motion sensor doesn't work
Reviews.Author: L-Con
Reviews.Content: I ordered this because of the flashing red light and "motion sensor," which of course, when it arrived, didn't work. How mad can you be when it's like $4 and comes from China though?

Reviews.Title: Ok product for the price
Reviews.Author: Phoenix5ire
Reviews.Content: Bought 3, when I got them 2 of them had broken parts not due to shipping. The internal parts are plastic and not of very good quality, vendor should consider doing QA before shipping to customer(s). I sent the 2 broken ones back and got refund from Amazon. The one that was intact, works great.

Reviews.Title: good gift
Reviews.Author: captain
Reviews.Content: Too wide to fit above front door jam. Needs a ceiling to mount.  I liked it but had no good place to mount it, so I gave it to my son-in-law. He liked it.

Reviews.Title: looks real does its job as decoy
Reviews.Author: Johnny
Reviews.Content: flashing red light looks like a real camera, once its set up properly on wall people will think its real. people act differently when they think they are being watched. had a problem upstairs tenants hanging out outside my door  in shared hallway. once this was in they ran by this thing. didn't hang out there anymore. great job for 4 bucks

Reviews.Title: one piece of junk
Reviews.Author: Wendell W. Glover "wink"
Reviews.Content: It fell apart when I was putting the battires in it and since it only cost $5,I just decided to just let it go and not try to return it for my money back.Do not buy this product.

Reviews.Title: Looks very real
Reviews.Author: jk
Reviews.Content: Cameras look real and red light on them lights up & it very shows. Great to place around your place of business to prevent theft

Reviews.Title: genius idea to save money
Reviews.Author: indy
Reviews.Content: i put some in public path to save money installing pricy cam. cus red light flash, it just look like real one. but i have to install on high position to avoid someone reach.

Reviews.Title: Good looking for the money
Reviews.Author: The Scout
Reviews.Content: I'm not sure yet whether I like the flashing red LED, but with or without, this is a very realistic looking decoy. Of course if your real cameras are the same style, that's even better.  Get a few of these and deploy them with the rest of your cameras. Recommend you make these things your first line of defence. Put these in view of real cameras and motion sensors, and if someone gets close to disable or take a look at these, you already are alerted.Decoys should be a part of any complete system.I would not recommend a system consisting only of decoys.

Reviews.Title: Faake Security Camera
Reviews.Author: Chuck
Reviews.Content: The camera itself was fine, but the mounting design was unsatisfactory.  It required positioning the screws at exactly the right depth, distance apart, and angle (otherwise the LED flashes at an odd angle).  A 2 piece design would have been better which would have allowed the base to be installed first, with the camera body then snapping over the base.  I realize that this design would probably cost more.

Reviews.Title: It serves the purpose!
Reviews.Author: Joel
Reviews.Content: This is just a cheap plastic dummy security dome camera that looks real.  It will deter crime in my opinion.  Like I have read in other reviews of this product, don't use the red blinking light.  Any criminal in the know will not fall for this.  I bought three, one for each end of the house and the other for the middle front door entrance.

Reviews.Title: Fools everybody!
Reviews.Author: Trace
Reviews.Content: I bought this as an inexpensive security measure when my apartment manager's car was stolen from right outside his front door. My neighbors think it's real and no longer loiter in front of my apartment late at night smoking and talking loudly. Well worth the investment for the added privacy alone!

Reviews.Title: Great little "cameras"
Reviews.Author: GardenGirl
Reviews.Content: This is one of those 'glad I ordered this!' items. It was a good price for the quality and it does the job its intended for. It absolutely looks authentic - (I wouldn't use the flashing red light feature, though). Installation is a breeze. It's virtually weather tight. Love this. Glad I ordered 3. I'll certainly use them.

Reviews.Title: Looks Real, Great Price!
Reviews.Author: R. Williams
Reviews.Content: I'm super happy with my purchase of this fake dome video camera!Pros: - Looks real. - Cheap. - Easy to mount. I used velco to attach it to the porch roof without any problems. - Flashing red light is bright and visible.Cons: - None really.

Reviews.Title: Dummy Security Camera
Reviews.Author: Yofrankie
Reviews.Content: Great product.  This camera is outside and it looks real to ward off thieves.  If you want a camera to secure your home this is the one to buy.

Reviews.Title: happy with it
Reviews.Author: kpng
Reviews.Content: It looks real enough to me.  i would plan on mounting it where it cant be closely inspected, say 3 feet away from reach.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product.
Reviews.Author: R. Talathi "foodandfunlover"
Reviews.Content: Good product for the price. works as advertised. I was actually asked by few people oh you have survelliance. Overall no issues.

Reviews.Title: Security Camera
Reviews.Author: Kat
Reviews.Content: Product was exactly as described and exactly what I wanted and I am very pleased with it. It is working very well.

Reviews.Title: My Review
Reviews.Author: Keithmj "Noodj"
Reviews.Content: I got one of these when I bought two of the OUTDOOR FAKE / DUMMY SECURITY CAMERA w/ Blinking Light (Silver) to go with my FrontPoint Security system until I can get two outdoor cameras. This looks just like the ones that they use at the Five Guys restuarants and during the installation I dropped it and broke off the battery compartment but used a hot glue gun to fix it till I can get another one. This looks just like a real one and I am sure that people won't be able to tell the difference even if they are built on the cheap side. No screws are provides nor batteries either. I might go with the Q-See ones next time because of the name being on them and are suppose to be better quality.

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: Hound
Reviews.Content: I brought four of these to put on my rental property until I install some real ones. The shipment was fast and the price was cheap. Not sure if they will fool a hardcore criminal,but they should atleast scare the rockie criminals.

Reviews.Title: Very satisfied with product!!!
Reviews.Author: krystyna
Reviews.Content: Speed of service faster than expected. The camera looks good from a distance and the plastic sections particularly the body sections seems well built and very sturdy. The LED sensor is obvious in the night.

Reviews.Title: Just okay...
Reviews.Author: dennis
Reviews.Content: These are inexpensive so don't look for much. Made pretty poorly and have to make it work by trimming some excess plastic. It's LOOKS great and totally real with the nice red LED light blinking fast. If it hold up against the sun or rain under the trim of the house, is still to be seen. It seems to me it won't take much to ruin these, but what do I want for so cheap?

Reviews.Title: VideoSecu Imitation Security camera
Reviews.Author: Anne McG
Reviews.Content: I'm very pleased with my purchase , I use the imitation camera to enhance the security I already have on my property , this product is so realistic , people have commented on my new security system . I would highly recommend this product . The delivery was prompt , as always with my purchases from Amazon .

Reviews.Title: Good value
Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: The camera looks very real and the blinking light shows up quite nicely at night. Mounted near a doorway or entry and looking at it at very close range, it is difficult to tell it is a dummy. Easy to install. I gave it a 5 star.

Reviews.Title: Good for the money, it works fine
Reviews.Author: R. Jackson
Reviews.Content: It looks fake if you get within 3 feet so keep it out of easy view and it does the job fine with the look of a camera and flashing red light.  Two AA batteries last about a month so expect to change them every month to keep it working.  We installed these with some real cameras so it works well.

Reviews.Title: Fake camera fun
Reviews.Author: S. Gessler
Reviews.Content: Excellent!Lots of fun. Looks real as the actual ones at work. Purchase one of these and have weeks of fun. People freak out when they think they are being watched.

Reviews.Title: Video Secu Dummy Fake
Reviews.Author: Kathy
Reviews.Content: This was a piece of junk.  Did not work.  Wasn't worth the effort to return.  I was hoping to be able to use but the only thing I can do is hang it by the door it will not flash.

Reviews.Title: Broken Item
Reviews.Author: Kalen Dennis
Reviews.Content: The plastic shell was cracked. It looked like it was tossed around a few times. I would not have purchased it if i had known before.

Reviews.Title: Poorly made
Reviews.Author: Kerri McDonald
Reviews.Content: This imitation security camera is very poorly made. Trust me, you won't convince anybody this is a real camera if they see it up close.

Reviews.Title: VideoSecu Dummy Fake Imitation Security Camera with Flashing Light LED
Reviews.Author: Keith Weaver
Reviews.Content: Did not like the mounting.  Had to hang unit by flimsy wire will screwing into eaves of roof.  One wire broke off, but was able to fix it myself.  Again, has deterred trash in yard, just need to find something to keep dog owners from using my yard as a bathroom.

Reviews.Title: garbage product
Reviews.Author: eazyrider
Reviews.Content: i was happy that amazon delivered with their usual speed but when i open up this product it looked nice..i then tried to open the dome and imediately stripped the screw..then the battery cover broke when trying to put it on..a case of fumble fingerss..no way..this product is so cheaply made..the old saying applies..you only get what you pay for...my fault.....o well..get out the super glue

Reviews.Title: What a bunch of junk
Reviews.Author: Barbara A. Poole "BAP"
Reviews.Content: Shame on Amazon for selling such junk.This item started to fall to pieces before it could be installed.Don't buy this item, it's in the trash where it belongs.Even the English on the box was less than grade one level.Buyer beware!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT...
Reviews.Author: Glenn F. Scheuermann "GLENN SCHEUERMANN"
Reviews.Content: COME WITH A LITTLE WARDNING "THIS HOME IS BEING SURVAILED" RED LIGHT BLINKS,2 AA BATTERIES IS ALL YOU NEED .FORGET ADT...REMENBER TO ORDER YOU FAKE SUCURITY YARD SIGN TOO...HAVEN'S HAD ANY BREAK IN'S YET.BETTER THAN A BARKING DOG,AND,YOU DON'T HAVE TO WALK IT EVERY NIGHT.

Reviews.Title: Excelente compra...
Reviews.Author: Borikeando
Reviews.Content: Llego a tiempo, buen precio, en perfecto estado, excelente compra y se ven reales. Muchas Gracias... recomiendo la compra de estos fake domos y es preferible usarlos sin baterias.

Reviews.Title: May fool some...but not many!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This plastic globe is pretty ridiculous.....cheeply made, may fool a few....but doubtful!  Look before you leap....examine before you buy!  NOT!!!

Reviews.Title: VERY DIFFICULLT TO INSTALL!
Reviews.Author: Prescott Jones
Reviews.Content: This Dummy Security Camera needs to have longer wiring on the inside to accomidate holding it to install the base. Otherwise, you need 3 hands to literally hold the base, hold your screws, and turn your screw driver, all at once and not damage the wiring!

Reviews.Title: Poor quality
Reviews.Author: Boris
Reviews.Content: I ordered 3 of these and both delivered broken. The other one, the arm is broken off from the fake camera.

Reviews.Title: Fake cameras
Reviews.Author: Debra Schmidt
Reviews.Content: One came with the wires broken but do not wish to bother sending it back. Will have someone try and repair it. The only thing is that I wish it came with a bigger sign for posting as far as a warning. I also wish that it came with rechargeable batteries.

Reviews.Title: Didn't fool anyone.
Reviews.Author: Monica Iammatteo-Crep
Reviews.Content: We got these, put them up right away.  Overnight that first night someone walked through our gated yard and left the gates open to communicate to us that they were not fooled.  Guess we have to cough up the $$ for the real thing.

Reviews.Title: Cheap and barely worth it.
Reviews.Author: chuck 27
Reviews.Content: They are built to cheap to be good. From afar they look real but the wiring is poor to say the least. Battery replacement is going to be hard... it will take removing the entire camera. Out of the four.... two did not work because the wire is broke easy fix but still a pain. I would pay more for a redo of the entire camera..

Reviews.Title: Bad Product for what is advertised or pictured
Reviews.Author: frederick m negaard
Reviews.Content: Terrible product.  Inferior quality and design.  So bad I didn't even try to return. Internal wiring was deplorable.  They broke when opened with careful handling.

Reviews.Title: weak.
Reviews.Author: NMGardner "NMGardner"
Reviews.Content: Not much here.  No directions for mounting so I had to take it apart to get to mounting holes.  Would not buy again.

Reviews.Title: Mine was a piece of CRAP
Reviews.Author: auggie doggie
Reviews.Content: This has to be disassembled to attach the base to the mounting location. The wiring is so poorly soldered that it comes apart when trying to put the unit back together. Had I known of the extremely poor build quality, I would never have purchased this. BUYER BEWARE!!!

Reviews.Title: Save your money
Reviews.Author: Michael "Michael"
Reviews.Content: The are too cheap to even bother passing off as real and too cheap to be worth sending back as shipping is more than I paid for the product.  Save your money and do not bother buying.

Reviews.Title: VideoSecu camera
Reviews.Author: ralph
Reviews.Content: The product arrived on time. So far it looks very authentic and is working well so far. When someone walks by the LED lights starts flashing.

Reviews.Title: Disapointing piece of _____
Reviews.Author: Zenlighten
Reviews.Content: This item is total complete crap! Looks nothing like an authentic camera and is easily identifiable as a fake. The worst part is the product literally falls to pieces in your hands the minute you remove it from the box. Wires come unattached, brittle plastic fittings ALL break when reattaching cover, swiveling camera falls off it's mounts -  in short, this is the most shabby and cheap toy-product I've ever purchased. At $5.00 you'd think you would get what you pay for?  - well,  unfortunately, this piece of ___ is way over priced!

Reviews.Title: Cheap
Reviews.Author: James York
Reviews.Content: This thing looks like toy and boy is it cheap looking..Dont waste your money on this.....You get what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: Fake Security Camera, a piece of JUNK!
Reviews.Author: shopper
Reviews.Content: The idea of the product is good, that's why I bought it.  However, the quality is very, very poor, it's actually a piece of junk. The batteries are not making proper contact inside the compartment, so the light doesn't work. The battery compartment door can not be closed, there is too much excess material on all sides that prevents it from closing. There is a round piece that belongs in a hole on the side of the frame which was shipped loose because it does not fit into the hole. It apparently never fit into its opening so it was shipped loose.  Made in China.

Reviews.Title: Not good
Reviews.Author: Eugene S. Tiffany
Reviews.Content: Too small to look real. Not usable. These camera domes are suppose to not give away which direction an enclosed camera is pointing, and this one shows it points in but one direction. This is wrong.

Reviews.Title: Not worth it!
Reviews.Author: Martin Pieck
Reviews.Content: Hard to install, broke during installation, inconvenient to change battery, battery drains within a month. In my opinion it is not worth the investment.

Reviews.Title: Waste of my money
Reviews.Author: Kyle
Reviews.Content: It's nothing but a plastic junk. I am disappointed.I threw it away after I opened up the package.Light just blinks. That's about it.

ProductInfo.Features:
Dummy Fake dome surveillance camera with flashing light LED
Simple and easy installation.
Authentic styling - nobody will know the difference
Require 2 AA batteries ( not included)
Surveillance without the high cost
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu Fake Dummy Imitation Dome Security Camera with Flashing Light LED Cost-effective Security CCTV Simulated Dome Camera 3PZ
